name: Woocommerce Product Hover Show ToolTip Info
author: cuongdc

sections.description:
Show product short description tooltip info when user hover, designed to work with Woocommerce.
Please note, this plugin has no effect if Woocommerce plugin not activated or has no effect if somehow your site did not have jQuery installed(which normally not happens)

Found the plugin useful and want to donate? buy me some tea at Paypal.me, thank you very much!!!
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract then upload the plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. You are done ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
I got an issue

Oh, sorry to hear that, please open a support request then I will try to help ðŸ™‚

How can I change the Tooltip style?

Here a some useful CSS class that you can override style:

.cdc_thetip - The Tooltip itself

.cdc_thetitle - The Tooltip title

.cdc_thecontent - The Tooltip content
